name: SwFMOD
short_description: SwFMOD is a fully featured audio subsystem for Unreal Engine 1 games, Deus Ex in particular. SwFMOD is based on FMOD, a cross-platform audio library offering high-quality, high-performance, hardware-independent, 100% software audio mixing.
